short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts all Serbian cyrillic text to latin.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts all Serbian Cyrillic characters to Latin. It doesn't automatically, but that can be toggled, to manually transliterate, use right click menu or add-on icon. Auto translate list can be managed in options.
